alldb.table_sql:
SELECT U.ID_ AS NAME, U.REALNAME_ AS VALUE FROM T_USERS U LEFT JOIN T_USERS_DEPTS UD ON UD.USER_ID_ = U.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DEPTS D ON D.ID_ = UD.DEPT_ID_
WHERE D.ID_ NOT IN (SELECT D.ID_ FROM T_DEPTS D START WITH D.PID_ = '402881ef409b4bfa01409b9ce7fb01e6' CONNECT BY PRIOR D.ID_ = D.PID_) /~currentRawValue: and U.REALNAME_ like '%{currentRawValue}%' ~/

sqlserver.predefined_sql: with tree as ( select pid_,id_ FROM T_DEPTS where PID_ = '402881ef409b4bfa01409b9ce7fb01e6' UNION ALL select d.pid_,d.id_ FROM T_DEPTS d INNER JOIN Tree T ON d.PID_=t.id_ )
sqlserver.table_sql:
SELECT U.ID_ AS NAME, U.REALNAME_ AS VALUE FROM T_USERS U LEFT JOIN T_USERS_DEPTS UD ON UD.USER_ID_ = U.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DEPTS D ON D.ID_ = UD.DEPT_ID_
WHERE D.ID_ NOT IN ( select id_ from tree) /~currentRawValue: and U.REALNAME_ like '%{currentRawValue}%' ~/
